Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://futuregarage.net/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin pages
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /about
Allow: /faq
Allow: /contact-location
Allow: /all-season-tires
Allow: /winter-tires
Allow: /service-repair
Allow: /service-maintenance
